backend/main.mo: Motoko actor exposing a query method that returns static site info including name, tagline, and hero CTA.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining how to build and deploy the project to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based theme variables and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file setting metadata and loading the React app via main.jsx.
frontend/README.md: Frontend quick-start guide covering setup, scripts, and development workflow using React, Vite, and Tailwind.
frontend/src/App.jsx: React router configuration using hash history and wrapping routes with a theme provider.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TypeScript version of the router setup with typings registered for TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer component showing branding, navigation links, social icons, and smooth-scroll contact behavior.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper combining navbar, routed content outlet, footer, and theme color provider.
frontend/src/components/SiteNavbar.tsx: Responsive navbar component with navigation links and theme/preset controls for desktop and mobile layouts.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSlid: Interactive testimonial slider showing user reviews with navigation arrows and indicator dots.
frontend/src/components/ThemeColorProvid: Provides theme color context using useThemeColor and exposes preset management to children.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth flow, storing identity, exposing login/logout, and handling initialization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteInfo.ts: Fetches site info from the backend actor with fallback values and loading state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeColor.ts: Manages theme color presets, loading from storage, validating values, and applying CSS variables based on mode.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, responsive utilities, and base styling rules.
frontend/src/main.jsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and renders App.jsx.
frontend/src/main.tsx: TypeScript entry point that initializes React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Displays an About page with hero section, agency story, and values using styled components.
frontend/src/pages/Booking.tsx: Implements a booking form with prefilled package data, submission handling, and a WhatsApp contact link.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero banner, featured destinations, contact form, and site info integration.
frontend/src/pages/HoneymoonOffers.tsx: Shows a list of honeymoon travel packages with details, imagery, and navigation to booking.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Provides the site’s privacy policy with sections on data collection, usage, security, cookies, and external links.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Renders the Services page with hero sections and a grid of cards describing travel-related services like flights, hotels, and transportation.
frontend/src/pages/TourGuide.tsx: Displays the Tour Guide page featuring hero content, guide descriptions, images, and feature cards highlighting guide capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/TourPackages.tsx: Implements the Tour Packages page, defining a list of travel packages and rendering them as cards with details and images.
frontend/src/pages/Vehicles.tsx: Shows the Vehicles page with a hero section and a grid of vehicle cards populated from a static list.
frontend/src/utils/slug.ts: Provides functions to normalize, validate, and generate deterministic slugs, including handling hostname-based deployment IDs.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type declaration file enabling Vite-specific TypeScript types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin settings for the project.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-oriented builds, specifying module resolution and included files.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, path aliases, environment definitions, dev server settings, and build output options.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s deployment-only requirements and lists four pending feature requests focused on deploying and verifying the site without modifying any files.
